content: about design harvest shawl has a triangular shape and is worked from one point to the other by a play of increases and decreases the patterns are composed of lace stitches and columns of slipped knit stitches the size of the shawl is easily modified just keep adding more row for a bigger version material 1 strand of knitting for olive merino 250m 4 balls held together with 1 strand of knitting for olive soft silk mohair 225m 4 balls sample in merino cream colorway and soft silk mohair cream colorway circular needle 4 mm with a cable of at least 80cm 1 sewing needle 1 cable needle some markers if you need to separate your work for each motif --- free patterns are for personal use only no help will be provide thank you for your understanding les patrons gratuits sont à usage personnel uniquement aucune aide ne sera apportée à leurs réalisations merci de votre compréhension
